document.full_text: britain, france, germany and portugal are asking the u.n. security council to condemn syria's violent crackdown against protesters and urge restraint by the government, council diplomats said on monday.
document.title: eu powers push u.n. council to condemn syria: envoys
lines_and_colors: britain, france, germany and portugal are asking the u.n. security council to condemn syria's violent crackdown against protesters and urge restraint by the government, council diplomats said on monday.
